Flora, seu, De florum cultura, or, A complete florilege, furnished with all requisites belonging to a florist by John Rea, Gent. Rea, John, d. 1681.
[25], 239, [20] p. : plans.
Printed by J.G. for Richard Marriott ..., London : 1665.
Imperfect: t.p. for Ceres is lacking on film. Added t.p., illus.: Flora, Ceres & Pomona, by John Rea. Ceres and Pomona have special t.p. "The table" [i.e. index] on p. [2]-[4] at end. Errata on p. [4] at end. Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
=======
Flora, seu, De florum cultura, or, A complete florilege, furnished with all requisites belonging to a florist by John Rea, Gent. Rea, John, d. 1681.
[25], 239, [20] p. : plans.
Printed by J.G. for Richard Marriott ..., London : 1665.
Imperfect: t.p. for Ceres is lacking on film. Added t.p., illus.: Flora, Ceres & Pomona, by John Rea. Ceres and Pomona have special t.p. "The table" [i.e. index] on p. [2]-[4] at end. Errata on p. [4] at end. Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
Richard Marriott
J.G.
